name: Breakout (Godot Wild Jam)
description:
I had attempted to create a reverse breakout but considering I only got started on this on the last day of the jam I had to just submit the default breakout.

As part of my 50 games in 50 weeks challenge. 

I consider this game incomplete for the Jam requirements, but complete as a game a week challenge.

Also this game was built in Godot 4 Beta 13
